None.Name: Power-Up
None.Description: Targeted own unit gains additional strength of 1700 that will either slowly degenerate or can be used up to improve the unit's performance. As long as the extra srength lasts unit deals 50% more damage and takes 50% less damage. Lasts for 20 seconds. Reusable every 10 seconds.

Extra.en: Strength points seem to have no influence whatsoever. Unholy Power works as a straightup +50% attack,  -50% incoming damage buff.
